greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle S(n, k) by rows: coefficients of 2^((n-1)/2))*(x^(1/2)*d/dx)^n, where n = 1, 3, 5, ...
comment: Triangle S(n,n-k) by rows: coefficients of 2^n * |L(n,1/2,x)|, with L the generalized Laguerre polynomials.
link: U. N. Katugampola, Mellin Transforms of Generalized Fractional Integrals and Derivatives, Appl. Math. Comput. 257(2015) 566-580.
U. N. Katugampola, Existence and Uniqueness results for a class of Generalized Fractional Differential Equations, arXiv preprint arXiv:1411.5229, 2014
xref: Rows includes odd rows of A223168.
Rows includes absolute values of A098503 from right to left of the triangular form.
results.author: _Udita Katugampola_, Mar 21 2013
